mapper.select: select qna_idx, faqtype_idx, customer_idx, qna_title, qna_text, qna_picture, qna_image, qna_state, qna_clear_date, qna_date, qna_del, qna_ans from customer_qna where qna_del=false and customer_idx=#{customer_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into customer_qna( qna_title, faqtype_idx, qna_text) values ( {#qna_title}, {#faqtype_idx}, {#qna_text})
mapper.update: update customer_qna( set qna_title = #{qna_title}, faqtype_idx = #{faqtype_idx}, qna_text = #{qna_text}) where qna_idx = #{qna_idx}
